name: flimtop
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c1, ctop))

stmt.origin: simp1d(wcel(c0, co(c1, cflim, c2)), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, cuni(crn(cfil))), wss(c2, cpw(cuni(c1))))
